name: The Velvet Throne
description: Aged bourbon, cherry liqueur, and spiced honey with a rosemary garnish.

name: King's Jewel
description: Gin, cucumber, elderflower tonic, and lime with edible gold flakes.

name: Rustic Crown
description: Mezcal, orange juice, and spiced maple syrup with a cinnamon stick.

name: Majesty’s Martini
description: Dry martini with vodka and black truffle essence, served with a golden olive.

name: Royal Orchard
description: Apple brandy, caramel syrup, and sparkling apple cider.

name: The Noble Spritz
description: Sparkling water with blood orange, mint, and grenadine.

name: Crown Jewel Cooler
description: Cucumber, basil, lime, and agave syrup with soda.

name: Golden Hour
description: Pineapple, coconut water, and passionfruit, garnished with orange.

name: Earl’s Elixir
description: Iced Earl Grey tea with lavender honey and thyme.

name: Rustic Bliss
description: Ginger beer with vanilla and lime, served in a copper mug.
